page.title: 16BAMFORD CARNIVAL WEEK
page.content: IT IS TRADITIONAL IN OUR VILLAGE TO HOLD A CARNIVAL EACH YEAR. IT IS USUALLY HELD WEEKENDING THE 20th.JULY AMONGST THE MANY EVENTS TAKING PLACE THIS YEAR ARE;{ {JUNIOR AND SENIOR FELL RACES { BOAT RACE ON THE RIVER {DERWENT. } BALLOON RACE FIVE A SIDE FOOTBALL { {IT'S A KNOCKOUT COMPETITION} THE IT'S A KNOCKOUT COMPETITION IS ORGANISED BY THE SCHOOL .THE IDEA IS TO INVOLVE PEOPLE IN GAMES THAT ARE A LITTLE {DIFFERENT}. THE WHOLE VILLAGE IS DECORATED THIS WEEK AND A PRIZE IS AWARDED FOR THE MOST ATTRACTIVE STREET OR ROAD.
